alert.note: Alert for Kodiak Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 4:08AM AKST until February 10 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility as low as one half mile at times. * WHERE...Kodiak City. * WHEN...Through 9 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop around Kodiak City early this morning. Easterly winds will also increase this morning as a frontal system moves toward the region. Snow may be heavy at times. The snow is expected to mix with and changeover to rain around mid-morning as temperatures climb into the mid to upper 30s.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
